page.title: 04Dominoes
page.content: Within the area there is a very strong tradition of inter pub darts and dominoes leagues.In the pub where I live every Monday night except bank holiday Monday we have a domino handicap.This is where some of the local people join together and play dominoes just for fun.Everyone pays 25p to enter and whoever wins takes all the money raised.The names are placed in a mug and and every name is pulled out and partnered together.Then the first heat is played and the winners of that heat play again and so on until you get to the last two people who then play the final.The kitchen provides a pie and pea supper for all the people who enter.They all enjoy themselves very much.I think this is a good form of recreation.
